prompts: Create a humanoid Pokemon that excels in hand-to-hand combat and has a tough exterior.
I want a strong Pokemon with a blue body and a muscular build that represents determination.
Generate a fighting-type Pokemon with a unique hairstyle and a fierce expression suitable for battles.
Make a small Pokemon that embodies the spirit of a martial artist and has a playful demeanor.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in mountainous areas and has a mix of blue and gray colors.
Design a bipedal creature with a solid physique and a competitive personality, ready for challenges.
Give me an energetic Pokemon with a rugged look that enjoys training and physical activities.
